overview: Two gangsters are playing poker. It's a big bet, the nightclub belongs to one of the two. When one of the gangsters finds out he's being cheated on by the other, he cheats on him and says he's hooking up, he gets his hands on the gangsters ' club and starts making it the biggest sex club there is. In the meantime, the other gangster is not sitting still and he wants revenge. A movie gets shot up pretty bad, but not with bullets.
title: Folies anales
